official_title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the Washington, D.C.-MD-VA Metropolitan Statistical Area and the Baltimore, MD Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Provides for an eight percent increase in basic pay for General Schedule employees within the Baltimore, Maryland, and Washington, D.C., metropolitan statistical areas.

titles.title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the Washington, D.C.-MD-VA Metropolitan Statistical Area and the Baltimore, MD Metropolitan Statistical Area.
